data.name: Sheepy: A Short Adventure Demo
data.detailed_description:
Help Sheepy, an abandoned plushy brought to life, as he explores a forgotten and broken world. Sheepy: A Short Adventure is the first short game from MrSuicideSheep.

The demo covers Zone One and is taster of what is to follow... ENJOY

Sheepy.

x . x
data.about_the_game:
Help Sheepy, an abandoned plushy brought to life, as he explores a forgotten and broken world. Sheepy: A Short Adventure is the first short game from MrSuicideSheep.

The demo covers Zone One and is taster of what is to follow... ENJOY

Sheepy.

x . x
data.short_description: A Short Handcrafted Pixel Art Platformer that follows Sheepy, an abandoned plushy brought to life. Sheepy: A Short Adventure is the first short game from MrSuicideSheep.

content_descriptors.notes: Occasional Blood Spatters, Horror Elements, Some Skeletons... Possibly An Angry Bear That Wants to Eat Your Face...
